revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=Cloud Engines |model=Pogoplug |revision=Classic (POGO-B01) |asin=B00B7NFI6K |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=NAS |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=C7 |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50-60 |cpu1_brand=PLX Technology |cpu1_model=NAS7820;NAS7820-AABC; |cpu1_cspeed=700 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27U1G8F2BTR |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS1G63EFR |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA |expansion_usb_num=4 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J3 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211D |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=1A Low Dropout Regulator;Advanced Power Electronics;APE8901;;2;,,, 18V/2A Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;2;,,, 23V/3A Synchronous Rectified Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2307DN;;1;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;GL850G, HH1GD, 08G22, 041SR, 75931;1; |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.2; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.6; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, Arch Linux (Arm), Debian |oui_eth=00:25:31 }} {{TagLine|NAS Media Sharing Device}} :Internal unused SATA port. {{See also|List of Cloud Engines Devices}} ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[PLX Technology]]'' NAS7820 @700MHz :Dual-core ARM 11 MP *Memory: 128MB (DDR2) SDRAM *Storage: 128MB Serial NAND Flash, 1x SATA II (internal) *Network: 1x Gigabit Ethernet port *USB: 4x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 100-240V, .5A via C7 ===Wikis=== *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/cloudengines/pogoplugpro ''Pogoplug Pro'' on the '''OpenWrt''' wiki] ===Alternate OS support=== *[https://archlinuxarm.org/platforms/armv5/pogoplug-v2-pinkgray ''Arch Linux'' (Arm)] *[http://forum.doozan.com/read.php?3,6336 Install ''Debian'' on Pogoplug Pro] *[http://blog.qnology.com/2015/04/hacking-pogoplug-v3oxnas-proclassic.html ''Hacking the Pogoplug v3/Oxnas (Pro/Classic) with Debian''
on '''techNOLOGY''' blog] ([http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-_89K8LAAGLA/VSTIw24EoBI/AAAAAAAAAgc/gZkddbRr_4o/s1600/Pogoplug%2BV3.JPG PCB images]) ====Requirements==== *[[Cloud Engines Pogoplug Classic (POGO-B01)|POGO-B01]], POGO-B02, POGO-B03, POGO-B04 (''PLX'') - '''Pogoplug Classic''' *[[Cloud Engines Pogoplug Pro (POGO-P01)|POGO-P01]], POGO-P02 (Wi-Fi [[AzureWave AW-NE762H]]) - '''Pogoplug Pro''' *POGO-P21, POGO-P22, POGO-P24, POGO-P25 (''OxNAS'') - '''Pogoplug V3''' *[[Cloud Engines Pogoplug E02|POGO-E02]] (CPU: Marvell 88F6281 @1.2GHz ''Kirkwood'') - '''Pogoplug V2''' '''Note:''' Model numbers located on bottom of foot. Please ignore the label on the box. :You can potential receive a Pogoplug V2 when buying a P21/P22. :Check the bottom of the Pogoplug's foot for correct model ! __NOTOC__
